name: caVVVVe
description:
Adventure little wizard in the mysterious cave full of dangers and incredible people.
Enjoy challenging gameplay - then caVVVVe for you! Here you have to work hard to be like before you go through the next dungeon! Many clever enemies and treacherous traps will prevent you collect treasures, and the flying brains again and again send you to respawn!
